coded_answer.p: I am writing with reference to your letter and I would like to give you some information which I have been asked for.
Because my course finishes at the end of June and I am going to work for a Hotelhotel in August and September, I would like to travel in July. ItThat is the best time for me.

As far as accommodation is concernconcerned, I would like to say that I prefer to stay in tents. I like staying in tents because when we go on holiday with my friends, we always stay in tents, so I am used to staying in tents.

Moreover, I have also been asked to choose some activities. I would like to choose basketball and swimming. When I was at school, I have been playingplayed for the school team and I am good at swimming.
Finally, could you let me know what sort of clothes would be betterbest to bring. It would also be useful to know that how much money will be enough to bring.
I look forward to hearing from you.
